pages.text: The Bamboo Jungle is a subtype of the usual $(l:biomes/jungle)jungle$(). However, jungle trees are rare, instead, the vegetation is predominately $(l:blocks/bamboo)bamboo$(). Structure and mob spawning are mostly the same as in a normal jungle, $(l:mobs/panda)pandas$(), however, spawn only here. Like most biomes, this biome has a steeper hills variant.
